Basic:
import { Clipboard } from '@ark-ui/solid'
import { CheckIcon, ClipboardCopyIcon } from './icons'

const Basic = () => {
  return (
    <Clipboard.Root value="https://ark-ui.com">
      <Clipboard.Label>Copy this link</Clipboard.Label>
      <Clipboard.Control>
        <Clipboard.Input />
        <Clipboard.Trigger>
          <Clipboard.Indicator copied={<CheckIcon />}>
            <ClipboardCopyIcon />
          </Clipboard.Indicator>
        </Clipboard.Trigger>
      </Clipboard.Control>
    </Clipboard.Root>
  )
}
RenderFn:
import { Clipboard } from '@ark-ui/solid'
import { Show } from 'solid-js'
import { CheckIcon, ClipboardCopyIcon } from './icons'

const RenderFn = () => {
  return (
    <Clipboard.Root value="https://ark-ui.com">
      <Clipboard.Label>Copy this link</Clipboard.Label>
      <Clipboard.Control>
        <Clipboard.Input />
        <Clipboard.Trigger>
          <Clipboard.Context>
            {(context) => (
              <Show when={context().isCopied} fallback={<ClipboardCopyIcon />}>
                <CheckIcon />
              </Show>
            )}
          </Clipboard.Context>
        </Clipboard.Trigger>
      </Clipboard.Control>
    </Clipboard.Root>
  )
}
